&#3926;&#3964;&#3938;: to throw away; to give up or cast aside
Tenses and English are from Thumi, p.174-5 {T}
throw, SA 'bor ba, 'bor, to lose, past of 'bor, to cast aside, to cast away
cast away, abandon, throw [away], be left behind, lose, spread, scatter, disperse, put aside, eliminate, reject [!] [p 'bor],,
imp. of {'bor ba} give up!; SA {bor ba}
